Class InputFileHandler

java.lang.Object
edu.ccri.assignment.files.poi.AbstractPoiTestDataSource
assignment.test.util.InputFileHandler
All Implemented Interfaces:
edu.ccri.assignment.planets.data.DataAccessOperations, edu.ccri.assignment.planets.data.FileDataSource
public class InputFileHandler extends edu.ccri.assignment.files.poi.AbstractPoiTestDataSource implements edu.ccri.assignment.planets.data.FileDataSource, edu.ccri.assignment.planets.data.DataAccessOperations
This class is intended to manage the input obtained from an Excel file.
